nodes.text: A high ranking member in the Milvayne Authority was the superior officer of Tam Posla, who referred to them as "the brass". Some time before the Battle of Jedha City, the police officer took Posla off the investigation into criminals "Roofoo" and "Sawkee," yet despite this, the subordinate tracked the two to Jedha. Subsequently, Posla had his Milvayne Authority position removed by the superior, who cited his lack of sanction.
